original_text: So they and all that belonged to them went down alive into Sheol, and the earth closed over them, and they perished from the midst of the assembly.
korean_text: 그들과 그의 모든 재물이 산 채로 스올에 빠지며 땅이 그 위에 덮이니 그들이 회중 가운데서 망하니라

sentences.original_text: So they and all that belonged to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들과 그들에게 속한 모든 것은

sentences.original_text: and the earth closed over them,
and they perished from the midst of the assembly.
